entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
